content: Click the 3-bar menu icon (upper right), View/Layout/Folder Pane.

content: Corrections should I try upgrading to 64 bit first from 32 bit without doing anything?
creator: OkieUnix

content:
> The person who setup this application does not have any computer background at all.

I believe that. If they are not moving, it could be a result of the server forcing some configuration on you. Have you checked with your mail manager (assuming you are in an organization)

As for 64 bit, just install it over top the 32 bit. nothing more and nothing less.
creator: wsmwk
